mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as r, t.* from ( select * from ANNOUNCE order by an_num desc) t) where r between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into ANNOUNCE(an_num, an_title, an_writer, an_pwd, an_content) values(ann_seq.nextval, #{an_title}, #{an_writer}, #{an_pwd}, #{an_content})
mapper.update: update ANNOUNCE set an_title = #{an_title}, an_pwd = #{an_pwd}, an_content = #{an_content} where an_num = #{an_num}
